messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] To Unschoolers From Tamie: Special message to my won...
messages.msgSnippet: Sorry Lynda I didnt even think of that . So I wrote down the poem and typed it for everyone. Friends Are Like Angels Our friends are like angels, who brighten
messages.messageBody:
Sorry Lynda
I didnt even think of that . So I wrote down the poem and typed it for
everyone.

Friends Are Like Angels

Our friends are like angels,
who brighten our days.
In all kinds of wonderful,
magical ways.

Their thoughtfulness comes,
As a gift from above.
And we feel we're surrounded,
By warm, caring love.

Like upside-down rainbows,
Their smiles bring the sun.
And they fill our ho-hum moments,
With laughter and fun.

Friends are like angels,
without any wings.
Blessing our lives,
with the most precious of things.

Tamie
